UNION STRATEGIC ARCHIVE

CLEARANCE LEVEL 2

  • Index
    • Incidents
      • IR-000
      • IR-002
      • IRA-001

Summary

An anomalous frame exhibited non-deterministic behavior during deployment.

Description

The unit entered a feedback loop after exposure to unknown signal sources.

Further technical details require higher clearance.

Containment Status

Containment procedures are classified at clearance level 3 and above.

Notes

Operators should monitor the anomaly continuously and report deviations immediately.

Document ID: IR-002
